verses.text: Now \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, who \add was\add* also \w chief|strong="H6496"\w* \w governor|strong="H5057"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* him in the \w stocks|strong="H4115"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w high|strong="H5945"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, which \add was\add* by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* out of the \w stocks|strong="H4115"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto him, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*, but \w Magor-missabib|strong="H4036"\w*.\f + \fr 20.3 \ft Magor-missabib: that is, Fear round about\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w terror|strong="H4032"\w* to thyself, and to all thy \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*: and they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \add it:\add* and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall carry them \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and shall \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Moreover I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* all the \w strength|strong="H2633"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and all the \w labours|strong="H3018"\w* thereof, and all the precious \w things|strong="H3366"\w* thereof, and all the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, which shall \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* them, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* them, and \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

And thou, \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*, and all that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*: and thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and there thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and shalt be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* there, thou, and all thy \w friends|strong="H0157"\w*, to whom thou hast \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*.

¶ O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou hast \w deceived|strong="H6601"\w* me, and I was \w deceived|strong="H6601"\w*: thou art \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w* than I, and hast \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w*: I am in \w derision|strong="H7814"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*, every one \w mocketh|strong="H3932"\w* me.\f + \fr 20.7 \ft was deceived: or, was enticed\f*

For \w since|strong="H1767"\w* I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, I cried \w out|strong="H2199"\w*, I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* and \w spoil|strong="H7701"\w*; because the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was made a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* unto me, and a \w derision|strong="H7047"\w*, \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*.

Then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of him, nor \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* any more in his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. But \add his word\add* was in mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* as a \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* in my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, and I was \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* with \w forbearing|strong="H3557"\w*, and I \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \add stay\add*.

¶ For I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w defaming|strong="H1681"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w fear|strong="H4032"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*. \w Report|strong="H5046"\w*, \add say they\add*, and we will \w report|strong="H5046"\w* it. All my \w familiars|strong="H0582"\w* \w watched|strong="H8104"\w* for my \w halting|strong="H6763"\w*, \add saying\add*, Peradventure he will be \w enticed|strong="H6601"\w*, and we shall \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w* against him, and we shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* our \w revenge|strong="H5360"\w* on him.\f + \fr 20.10 \ft All…: Heb. Every man of my peace\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with me as a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* terrible \w one|strong="H6184"\w*: therefore my \w persecutors|strong="H7291"\w* shall \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*, and they shall not \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*: they shall be \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*; for they shall not \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w*: \add their\add* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w* shall never be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*.

But, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, that \w triest|strong="H0974"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \add and\add* \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* the \w reins|strong="H3629"\w* and the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, let me \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* on them: for unto thee have I \w opened|strong="H1540"\w* my \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: for he hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* from the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*.

¶ \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* wherein I was \w born|strong="H3205"\w*: let not the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* wherein my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* me be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* who brought \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* to my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w man|strong="H2145"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* is \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto thee; making him \w very|strong="H8055"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

And let that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be as the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w overthrew|strong="H2015"\w*, and \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* not: and let him \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and the \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w* at \w noontide|strong="H6256"\w*;

Because he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* me not from the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*; or that my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* might have been my \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, and her \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \add to be\add* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* \w great|strong="H2030"\w* \add with me\add*.

Wherefore came I \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w labour|strong="H5999"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*, that my \w days|strong="H3117"\w* should be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* with \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*?
